title: accounts for the alpha
body: well I'm from Maryland and I play LOL in the LAN server and NA server but I sing for the alpha tester Riot send me the email and I download the alpha but the thing is that they send me the link to download the alpha but not for my acc and also I'm lvl 21 in NA server and lvl 30 rank silver in LAN please can someone help me!!

replies.body:
You can use the Alpha in any region, you switch the region in the login screen. However, each account has to be accepted separately for alpha testing.

Once the open beta starts, any account in any region will be able to use the updated client.
